description:
The JPEGmini Pro desktop app is the ultimate solution for optimizing, converting, compressing and resizing your images and videos.

The JPEGmini Pro desktop app is the ultimate solution for optimizing, converting, compressing and resizing your images and videos.

- Automatically reduce the file size of your images and videos by up to 80%.
- Leveraging our one-of-a-kind and patented technology, we ensure every image and video is compressed to the minimal size without sacrificing the visual quality of the original file.
- With JPEGmini, your optimized files remain in standard image and video formats, ensuring easy integration and use across all platforms and devices.
